content.html: OK, so here's what the situation is. * Twitter is now owned by a right-wing narcissist * Facebook is unusable, genocide-supporting, and basically spyware * Instagram is owned by FB (sorry, ~*~Meta~*~) and basically adware * TikTok is censorious and also spyware
content.value:
OK, so here's what the situation is.
* Twitter is now owned by a right-wing narcissist
* Facebook is unusable,  genocide-supporting, and basically spyware
* Instagram is owned by FB (sorry, ~*~Meta~*~) and basically adware
* TikTok is censorious and also spyware
